data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jerusalem, Israel to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jerusalem, Israel

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 859,103, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Jerusalem, Israel to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 868,136 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,064 believers in Jerusalem, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Judeo-Berber people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 874,200 citizens of the the state of Jerusalem.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Jerusalem
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Jerusalem.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
